definition: Holland/the Netherlands/abbr. for 荷蘭|荷兰[He2 lan2]
to carry on one's shoulder or back/burden/responsibility
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
embroidered pouch for carrying loose change etc/purse/pocket (in clothing)
poached egg/egg fried on both sides

sentences.english: Demetrious: you are here, my dear Hermia! I found you for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 你在這裏，我親愛的荷米亞，我找你找了好久。

sentences.english: There were further protests in the coastal city of Hodeida.
sentences.chinese: 沿海城市荷臺達也爆發了進一步的抗議活動。

sentences.english: The lepton number is generalized to the lepton charge.
sentences.chinese: 我們把輕子數推廣爲輕子荷。

sentences.english: "Lotus Song Under Willow" by Chen Jun is aesthetically beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 陳軍的這張“柳下吟荷”很是唯美。

sentences.english: The lotus culture formed in the period from West Zhou Dynasty to the Spring and Autumn Period.
sentences.chinese: 荷文化形成於西周至春秋戰國時期。

sentences.english: Hern and I sat at two corners of the porch face to face, holding our blanket together.
sentences.chinese: 荷和我擁衾對坐，在廊子的兩角，遙遙談話。

sentences.english: The series carries a TV-G parental guideline.
sentences.chinese: 該系列帶有電視荷父母的準則。

sentences.english: May we have your check in settlement of this invoice-soon?
sentences.chinese: 爲了結算這張發票價款，請即送下支票爲荷。

sentences.english: The ploughman homeward plods his weary way.
sentences.chinese: 農夫荷鋤犁，倦倦回家門。

sentences.english: Nelumbo nucifera has a long history in our country.
sentences.chinese: 我國是荷的原產國，荷在我國栽培歷史悠久。

sentences.english: A storey was later added to the block in 1905. In 1919, the Headquarters Block facing Hollywood Road was constructed.
sentences.chinese: 於一九一九年又加建了面對荷李活道的四層高大樓。

sentences.english: HE and I were opposite each other, embracing the quilt in two corner of corridor, and chatting far away.
sentences.chinese: 荷和我擁衾對坐，在廊子的兩角，遙遙談話。

sentences.english: Both use tobacco from the premium Vuelta Abajo region.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個阿巴荷地區使用菸草的保費沃爾塔格。

sentences.english: Egeus: Hermia, you have to marry Demetrious, the best guy in the city.
sentences.chinese: 荷米亞，你必須嫁給狄米崔斯，這城中最好的年輕人。

sentences.english: Because of its lower effective nuclear charge, xenon is more easily oxidized than krypton.
sentences.chinese: 因爲氙的有效荷電荷較低，所以氙比氪容易被氧化。

sentences.english: The Netherlands is high and the Mongolian people are bound to be people with high IQ.
sentences.chinese: 而荷而蒙指數高的人，也必然是智商高的人。

definition: orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
Portugal/Portuguese/abbr. for 葡萄牙[Pu2 tao2 ya2]
the final (of a syllable) (Chinese phonology)/rhyme/appeal/charm/(literary) pleasant sound
